description: Try our easy to follow Sausage Shepherd's Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Shepherd's & cottage pie,Microwave,High fibre,Sausage,High protein,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Low sugar,Peanut free
name: Sausage Shepherd's Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Pan fry sausages in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat for 10 minutes until golden. Remove from pan, cool slightly and slice.
Reheat pan and cook frozen diced onion for 1 minute until golden.
Add mixed vegetables, cover and cook for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, make gravy according to packet instructions.
Return sausages to pan, add gravy and stir to combine. Transfer to a 6-cup ovenproof dish and place onto a baking tray.
Place frozen mashed potato into a microwave safe dish and heat for 4 minutes. Add butter and mix in until smooth.
Pile onto filling and swirl surface. Bake for 50 minutes until golden.
